name: Round Thin Plane: The Second Eye of The Tiger Side Story
name_original: Round Thin Plane: The Second Eye of The Tiger Side Story
description:
Round Thin Plane: The Second Eye of The Tiger Side Story

70,000,000 years after the great warrior Tiger of the warrior lands killed the god of the dragons destroying the universe a new adventure unfolds as the dragon god returns for revenge.

Controls = keybaoyrd.
